n, k = list(map(int, input().split()))
m = 0x3b9aca07
v = 500000004
r = 0
p = pow(2, n, m)
a = [1] + [0] * k
for i in range(k):
    for j in range(i, -1, -1):
        a[j + 1] += a[j]
        a[j] = a[j] * j % m
for i in range(k + 1):
    r = (r + p * a[i]) % m
    p = p * v * (n - i) % m
print(r)
